mgci.jhdap.shogi

Class Lance

  • java.lang.Object
    • mgci.jhdap.shogi.Piece
      • mgci.jhdap.shogi.PromotablePiece
        • mgci.jhdap.shogi.Lance

  • public class Lance
extends PromotablePiece
    A Class representing a lance in a game of shogi.

     int y,
     int allegiance)
        Constructs a lance at a given x and y-value, with the given allegiance.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-value at which this lance is located.
        y - The y-value at which this lance is located.
        allegiance - The allegiance of this lance.

      • mustPromoteIfMoved

        protected boolean mustPromoteIfMoved(GameState state,
                         int x,
                         int y)
        Description copied from class: Piece
        Returns whether this piece must promote after it moved into the given target tile.
        Overrides:
        mustPromoteIfMoved in class Piece
        Parameters:
        state - The state of the game before the piece is moved.
        x - The x-value to which this piece is trying to move.
        y - The y-value to which this piece is trying to move.
        Returns:
        Whether this piece must promote after it gets to the target tile.

      • promote

        protected Piece promote()
        Returns the Piece this lance promotes to. Creates a PromotedLance with the same allegiance and location as this lance.
        Specified by:
        promote in class PromotablePiece
        Returns:
        The PromotedLance equivalent of this Lance.

      • demote

        protected Piece demote()
        Returns the piece this Lance demotes to. As lances are not a promoted piece, demoting them has no effect.
        Specified by:
        demote in class PromotablePiece
        Returns:
        This Lance.
